Stan is Limboâ€™s Senior Vice President of Worldwide Sales. His career spans 10 years of advertising management, where he excelled in building and motivating high performance sales teams in print, online and mobile media.

Stan has served as VP/Head of Sales for the last 10 years for leading media companies such as Red Herring, Ziff Davis, CMP Media, Sybase 365 and On2.com. Most recently, Stan was at Sybase 365 as Managing Director of Mobile Sales for the Americas where he was responsible for all mobile ad sales in the United States, Canada and Latin America, as well as overseeing and extending all content relationships. Prior to Sybase 365, Stan was Group Associate Publisher at Ziff Davis in charge of all print and online sales for five industry-leading game publications and their respective websites. Before Ziff Davis, Stan was VP of Sales at Red Herring Inc., as well as Worldwide VP of Sales for On2.com.

Stan began his career in ad sales at CMP Media where he was Associate Publisher for the technology publication CRW. He graduated from the University of California with a Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Political Science and Business.
